title: FrenchinHK
author: FrenchinHK
content: Hi guys, i contact few whitelabel provider but still i didnt find what i want, i want the exact style and function as TIVIT, a 100% crypto casino with turbo games like Aviator, Dice and so on and slots onlyAny of you know where i can find a provider ? all in one solution preferedÂ Cheers

comments.author: bmwister
comments.body: I know the guys "PayAdmit" they are new to the market, they can make an offer, look at the conditions

comments.author: Erdogan
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 16, 2022, 05:24:36 PMHi guys, i contact few whitelabel provider but still i didnt find what i want, i want the exact style and function as TIVIT, a 100% crypto casino with turbo games like Aviator, Dice and so on and slots onlyAny of you know where i can find a provider ? all in one solution preferedÂ CheersIt may not be a very original proposition, or maybe you've already tried it.. but, If you like the games from Tivit so much, just ask who their provider is, or if they would like to resell the licenses to you? At least I would start with that..

comments.author: FrenchinHK
comments.body: Quote from: Erdogan on May 16, 2022, 08:30:46 PMQuote from: FrenchinHK on May 16, 2022, 05:24:36 PMHi guys, i contact few whitelabel provider but still i didnt find what i want, i want the exact style and function as TIVIT, a 100% crypto casino with turbo games like Aviator, Dice and so on and slots onlyAny of you know where i can find a provider ? all in one solution preferedÂ CheersIt may not be a very original proposition, or maybe you've already tried it.. but, If you like the games from Tivit so much, just ask who their provider is, or if they would like to resell the licenses to you? At least I would start with that..I did but no answer ðŸ˜€

comments.body: Quote from: bmwister on May 16, 2022, 06:52:56 PM  I know the guys "PayAdmit" they are new to the market, they can make an offer, look at the conditionsThqnks i check but they only provide payment option, thanks anyway mate

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 17, 2022, 05:16:25 PMI did but no answer ðŸ˜€ Try contacting again and maybe they will answer and also try creating an account on the site where you find it and ask them the provider. Maybe try to ask as a gambler there and not as a person who will start own casino. Maybe that's the reason why they did not answer as they see you as a potential rival and they may lose gamblers on their own site. I think there is a thread in Bitcointalk about prividers or a list of providers.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Having someone develop a copycat of the TIVIT site with the same functions without the permission of the original owner will render your effort useless since your site will be abusing copyright law. So as others may have suggested get in touch with the original owner to get the right license approval either from them directly or from their game providers.

comments.author: kotwica666
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on May 17, 2022, 06:58:06 PMHaving someone develop a copycat of the TIVIT site with the same functions without the permission of the original owner will render your effort useless since your site will be abusing copyright law. So as others may have suggested get in touch with the original owner to get the right license approval either from them directly or from their game providers.After all, this is what he asks:Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 16, 2022, 05:24:36 PMAny of you know where i can find a provider ? If they do not respond to the e-mail, try (as someone already mentioned earlier) as a player, ask the support directly. Normally it shouldn't be a problem to find out who is the games provider. In principle, such information should be generally available to players.I found one Tivit telegram group about affiliate program, so maybe you can try there: https://t.me/+delI7QlpE5djYWJi

comments.author: keyscore44
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 16, 2022, 05:24:36 PMHi guys, i contact few whitelabel provider but still i didnt find what i want, i want the exact style and function as TIVIT, a 100% crypto casino with turbo games like Aviator, Dice and so on and slots onlyAny of you know where i can find a provider ? all in one solution preferedÂ CheersI found out from an unofficial source that CactusX may be the gaming provider for Tivit.bet. Unfortunately, apart from an empty website, I could not find any information on whether such a provider exists.https://games.cactusx.io/

comments.author: FrenchinHK
comments.body: Thanks to you guys for all your answer , appreciate it

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 21, 2022, 03:04:14 PMThanks to you guys for all your answer , appreciate it According to the information from their site, all the games you mentioned are their original, developed in-house. I suggest you try to contact them through the TiViT.Partners portal and ask if they offer a white label. If they do, that may very well be the way to go. It's certainly much easier than searching and contacting the supplier for an exact copy of the games.

comments.author: wiss19
comments.body: Don't know if this idea is allowed. Why you want to exactly copy another site? Do you still expect that if you do that, you can attract players? Sorry but players will think this was suspicious. They will think it's a phishing or a scam site.What is allowed is I think having the same games such as dice because many casinos did that but your designs must be unique. Some functions can be copied like deposits, withdrawals and similar. Obviously because that is how a gambling site works. And what provider do you mean. Game provider? There's plenty of them online but if you mean provider to make a clone site, you can try the service section of the forum. Saw someone offered the same service before.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 16, 2022, 05:24:36 PMHi guys, i contact few whitelabel provider but still i didnt find what i want, i want the exact style and function as TIVIT, a 100% crypto casino with turbo games like Aviator, Dice and so on and slots onlyAny of you know where i can find a provider ? all in one solution preferedÂ CheersI'd rather suggest that you would look for real developers than rely on providers. Hire a bunch of professionals who can make your idea happen. With that, you could mold your creativity to life and be unique against all of your competitors. You don't need a huge company to help you create things you want to bring life on, just look for those who can create pavements for your idea and the rest would be a hugee huge history.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 21, 2022, 03:04:14 PMThanks to you guys for all your answer , appreciate it Why you want to exactly copy the site?Develop something new and interesting that will keep the gamblers connected to your site.A gambling site becomes famous for itâ€™s customer service and unique features.If you are gonna copy all the features and functions from an already present site, then people will call you a copy.Also in order to copy the features, you need to seek permission from the original owner about it. Else you will be ready for lawsuit filed against you by the original company.Nevertheless at the the end of the day, itâ€™s you to take the decision. And i am pretty sure you are enough wise to know what will be better for you.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: decodx on May 21, 2022, 03:59:26 PMQuote from: FrenchinHK on May 21, 2022, 03:04:14 PMThanks to you guys for all your answer , appreciate it According to the information from their site, all the games you mentioned are their original, developed in-house. I suggest you try to contact them through the TiViT.Partners portal and ask if they offer a white label....When you open any of their 'Original games' you will see the TiViT logo, which means those games were made for that casino, but I wouldn't call that games original because we can find the same games on Roobet or Stake. Even the style looks the same. If feels like is the same casino provider for all these services.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: It's not clear what you're looking for, in fact we have many gambling sites here that offer Dice, Mines, Crash, jackpot, Double games as offered by the TIVIT.BET site, although you say Tivit.bet has more bets than regular casinos or certain strategies, but we have never tried it.Are you a real user for the Tivit gambling site, a little curious, do you have experience playing on the Tivit site such as: jackpot, spellcast, accident and so on, what do you get there.Then if you have contacted the whitelabel service, you are not satisfied, maybe you can try contacting the SOFTSWISS service, who knows there is a gambling site that is the same as TIVIT.BET.

comments.author: FrenchinHK
comments.body: When i say Â«Â same asÂ Â» itâ€™s mean the same kind, with same games and same kind of design not a 1 for 1 copy, anyway thanks for your comment. But no need to answer exactly the same things thats the previous people answerover and over again

comments.author: Newlifebtc
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 16, 2022, 05:24:36 PMHi guys, i contact few whitelabel provider but still i didnt find what i want, i want the exact style and function as TIVIT, a 100% crypto casino with turbo games like Aviator, Dice and so on and slots onlyAny of you know where i can find a provider ? all in one solution preferedÂ CheersSome of us is far beyond what you are looking for, people that should know about this very well is people who play gamble very well and understand it perfectly, for me what i have to say is that since you are looking for alternative the best place to solicit for help is the service board despite that it involves gambling and other of things you mention and, people who knows well about poker game and Dice game will know the exactly

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: FrenchinHK on May 30, 2022, 05:10:12 PMWhen i say Â«Â same asÂ Â» itâ€™s mean the same kind, with same games and same kind of design not a 1 for 1 copy, anyway thanks for your comment. But no need to answer exactly the same things thats the previous people answerover and over againÂ  Â    Well, to be honest, you did say: "exact style and function as TIVIT" ... Exact usually means identical, verbatim, line for line copy.Perhaps if you are really looking for developers who can do this, you could post a request in the Services section? You might get some offers if your budget is right.
